text: I honour the timeline; it’s written in accidental optimism.
I trust the values framework. Especially the parts copied from another brand.
I accept that we named the brand after a typo and now it's too late.
I honour the strategy deck. It’s 90% adjectives, 10% transitions.
I will not question the founder quote. I will simply move it to slide 3.
I trust that no one will ask what 'authentic yet disruptive' means.
I believe this brand is a movement. Mostly bowel.
I honour the manifesto, even though it contains zero nouns.
I will not laugh during the purpose workshop. Not out loud.
